report.title: Unallocated Squares
report.description: Map showing monads (squares) where the ones that have a user allocation are shown in a different colour to the ones that don't.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.person_attribute_id=#user_square_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u on u.person_id=pav.person_id AND u.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users_websites uw on u.id=uw.user_id AND uw.created_on >= CAST(COALESCE('#ignore_registration_dates_before#','1500-01-01') as date) LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEx on lavEx.location_id=l.id AND lavEx.location_attribute_id=#excluded_square_attr_id# AND lavEx.deleted=false WHERE (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id# OR l.location_type_id=#additional_square_type_id#) AND #website_filter# AND lavEx.int_value != 1 AND l.deleted=false

param.name: user_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: ignore_registration_dates_before
param.description: Ignore anyone who registered earlier than this date where working out if a square has been allocated or not.

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any sqaures created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.

param.name: post_code_geom
param.description: Post code geometry, so we only show squares closest to the user.

param.name: distance_from_post_code
param.description: The distance to return items from the specified post code.

param.name: excluded_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of attribute that holds whether a square is excluded or not. If it is excluded then don't display on the map.

column.name: sc
column.sql: case count(distinct(pav.id)) when 0 then 'green' else 'red' end

column.name: fc
column.sql: case count(distinct(pav.id)) when 0 then 'green' else 'red' end
